name: Mail Delivery Game
description:
You are a mailman tasked with delivering letters to the residents of the city. Run, jump, and swing your way around the metropolis.

NOTICE: Play this game in windowed mode. The resolution gets messed up if it's enlarged or fullscreened

---------------------------

Controls (Designed with controller in mind):

Controller:

  • A: Jump
  • D-Pad: Move

Keyboard:

  • Space: Jump
  • Move: Arrow keys

When in the air near a pole, press D-Pad+X (Arrow keys+A on keyboard) to swing in the direction you are holding

---------------------------

I had a lot of fun making this! Though I must admit, it was frustrating at times as well. I didn't have time to finish the graphics... but I'll definitely be doing that later, so feel free to come back and play it again when that happens.
